commit.message:
re PR ipa/59469 (LLVM build failure with gcc LTO)


	PR ipa/59469
	* lto-symtab.c (lto_cgraph_replace_node, lto_varpool_replace_node):
	merge force_output and forced_by_abi flags.

From-SVN: r207449
